channel.title: Ux on Poke
channel.description: Recent content in Ux on Poke

item.title: User interface
item.description: The user interface provides an easy way to visualize metrics provided by agents. It is created in order to fastly highlight websites malfunctions. Just behind there is an example of what you could see using the poke monitoring system: As we can see, there are three paths of the domain google.com answering using HTTPS protocol which are monitored by poke. Furthermore, there are the HTTP response status and latency displayed.
